task_background: Prepare the emergency field medical station for incoming casualties by organizing supplies, repairing equipment, and ensuring all critical areas are functional.

tasks.task_description: Place the defibrillator_1 on the triage_table_1.
Find the heaviest, functional IV stand and place it next to the triage_table_1.
Open the locked stimpack_dispenser_1 using the hidden_key_1.
Find the coffee-stained field manual and use it to mute the flickering vitals_monitor_1.
